name: Dungeon Raiders (2010)
description: Start off on a grand adventure with a team of sketchy heroes to rescue your friend! Control a band of misfits as you explore massive dungeons, fight off crazed creatures, elude booby traps and solve dozens of puzzles in your quest to rescue your friend who was kidnapped by his father and sent to hell so he could assume responsibility for the family 'business'. From the halls of Count Dracula's reti
